root.name: Lennus II: Fuuin no Shito
root.description: OverviewLennus II: Fuuin no Shito is the second and final entry in the Lennus series of JRPGs, known as Paladin's Quest in the United States, developed by Copya System. Asmik Ace Entertainment published Lennus II in Japan for the Super Famicom on July 26, 1996 and was never not released overseas by Enix like the previous title. An English fan translation patch was created for Lennus II by a group named Dynamic Designs, which was released on October 15, 2008.
